title: Smoked haddock mousse
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter', '300ml milk', '1 bay leaf', '1 tablespoon whole peppercorns', '450g smoked haddock fillets', '3 eggs, hard boiled and finely chopped', 'juice of 1/2 a lemon', '150g mayonnaise', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh chives', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', '15g powdered gelatine', '150ml double cream, whipped']
